resources.string: Hello there fellow shibes! Here\'s what\'s waiting for you in v1.4 of Weather Doge:
Fun stuff! If it\'s not to your liking you can turn it off in the settings.

• Material design color scheme!
• Doge-isms never overlap and two of the same text will never appear at the same time
• Better font and drop-shadow rendering on the widget
• Widget will now always display the last refresh time regardless of cache age
• Support for Android 5.1
• Dropped support for Gingerbread
• Better RTL support
• Google Play Services-free build available
• Updated Comic Neue
• Updated Roboto
• Potential bug fixes
• Updated build system
\nIf things aren\'t going the way you\'d like please do not hesitate to send us an email via support@versobit.com.
